Citation

Source: inst/CITATION

Vitolo, C., Fry, M. and Buytaert, W., 2016. rnrfa: an R package to retrieve, filter and visualize data from the UK National River Flow Archive. The R Journal, 8(2), pp.102-116.

Authors

  • Ilaria Prosdocimi. Contributor, maintainer.

  • Claudia Vitolo. Author.
    Claudia is the original creator of the package

  • Matthew Fry. Contributor.
    Matthew supervised the unofficial API integration.

  • Wouter Buytaert. Contributor.
    This package is part of Claudia Vitolo's PhD work and Wouter is the supervisor.

  • Michael Spencer. Contributor.
    Michael updated the function osg_parse to work with grid references of different lengths.

  • Tobias Gauster. Contributor.
    Tobias improved the function osg_parse introducing vectorisation

Developed by Ilaria Prosdocimi, Claudia Vitolo.
